> From: J. B. Rainsberger [mailto:jbrains@...]
>
[...]
> If only it were named better. I'm not sure what a "session
> facade" has to do with a "session". I call it "Business Logic
> Gateway". I can't remember what Martin Fowler calls it in his book.

Fowler calls it "Remote Facade."  That seems right.  Session facade is too
EJB specific (session EJB facade for entities).

Scott S.
